name: RETIRED ENLISTED ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Lobbying to support some provisions and against other provisions in the FY2018 National Defense Authorization Act including in favor of full raise in House version of NDAA for Active Duty, Guard and R

Lobbying in favor of tax credits for NG & Reservists in critical infrastructure utilities; and tax requirements for VSOs; assure that veterans are qualified for healthcare tax credits whether enrolled

Lobbying to repeal sunset provision of the Choice Act; improve CHOICE Act in H.R. 2998 & S. 1557 & H.R. 2478 as well as assuring the protection of medical care within the VA  and improving health care
lobbying in support of HR4107 and S2101 USS Indianapolis Congressional Gold Medal Act

Lobbying to support some provisions and against other provisions in the FY2018 National Defense Authorization Act including in favor of full raise in House version of NDAA for Active Duty, Guard and R
